languages.text: "Каллигос Винтерскейл пал! Не думал, что доживу до этого дня — он казался неистребимым, практически бессмертным".
"Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."
languages.original_text: "Каллигос Винтерскейл пал! Не думал, что доживу до этого дня — он казался неистребимым, практически бессмертным".

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔陨落了！我从没想过我能活着看到这一天。曾经的他看起来是那么坚不可摧，几乎等同于不朽。”
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."

traits.locale_text: “卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔陨落了！我从没想过我能活着看到这一天。曾经的他看起来是那么坚不可摧，几乎等同于不朽。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Calligos Winterscale n'est plus ! Voilà un jour que je n'aurais jamais cru voir arriver... Lui qui semblait indestructible, presque immortel ! »
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."

traits.locale_text: « Calligos Winterscale n'est plus ! Voilà un jour que je n'aurais jamais cru voir arriver... Lui qui semblait indestructible, presque immortel ! »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «¡Calligos Winterscale ha caído! No pensaba que vería el día. Parecía indestructible, prácticamente inmortal».
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."

traits.locale_text: «¡Calligos Winterscale ha caído! No pensaba que vería el día. Parecía indestructible, prácticamente inmortal».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールが死んだとは！生きてこの日を迎えるなど、思いもよりませんでした…倒れることなどない、ほぼイモータル同然に思っていました」
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."

traits.locale_text: 「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールが死んだとは！生きてこの日を迎えるなど、思いもよりませんでした…倒れることなどない、ほぼイモータル同然に思っていました」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Calligos Winterzunder ist gefallen! Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich diesen Tag einmal erlebe. Er wirkte unzerstörbar, fast unsterblich."
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterzunder ist gefallen! Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich diesen Tag einmal erlebe. Er wirkte unzerstörbar, fast unsterblich."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."

languages.text: "Calligos Winterscale yitti! Bu günü görecek kadar yaşayacağımı düşünmezdim. Yok edilemez, neredeyse ölümsüz gibiydi."
languages.original_text: "Calligos Winterscale has fallen! I never thought I'd live to see this day — he seemed indestructible, practically immortal."

traits.locale_text: "Calligos Winterscale düştü! Bu günü görecek kadar yaşayacağımı düşünmüyordum. Yok edilemez, neredeyse ölümsüz gibi gözüküyordu."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
